name: Dark Magenta Silk Scarf
description:
The colour concept for this shade of purple scarf arose from the jewel-like wing casings found on the Violet Ground Beetle.  Noticeably  shimmering, yet with a deep, rich colour.  

A deep purple scarf great to team with either a denim or leather jacket or a blazer for a more dressed up look.

144 x 91cm

Care Info:

100% Silk.  Cool handwash only.

Delivery info:

Item ships Recorded Delivery FREE to: UK Mainland

Otherwise Recorded Delivery is £4.00 - £4.99 to:

Europe 
USA 
Everywhere else 
(Please select exact location in checkout process)

name: "Blue Sands" Ikat Silk Scarf
description:
Blue Sands print from the NANUKK limited edition range inspired by the tide washing over the sand on the beach.

A square scarf featuring a traditional Ikat style print.  Blue, burgundy and cream colours twist together to form a fantastic neck accessory or head band.  This also looks amazing when loosely draped around shoulders for a flowing statement scarf.


Made In England

COMPOSITION
100% Silk Single Georgette

DIMENSIONS
Approx 90cm x 90cm 

CARE
Dry clean only

*FREE RECORDED DELIVERY to all UK Mainland*
For everywhere else please select your shipping destination at the checkout.  Please allow 3-5 days for delivery, although it will usually take less time.

When you buy online, NANUKK scarves are sent to you beautifully packaged in our elegant signature box and are perfect for giving as a gift.

name: Indigo Blue Sunset Silk Scarf
description:
A square silk scarf featuring a deep blue indigo and striped clouds print.  This square size is perfect for rolling and twisting for wearing around the neck or wrapping into an elegant head band.

From a range of limited edition prints by NANUKK, the Indigo Blue Sunset scarf is inspired by the sun setting over the coastline in Cornwall, England in the Autumn.  The orange and grey stripes through the clouds compliment the deep, rich blue colour and make the scarf perfect for twisting up and finishing off all kinds of outfits.

Made In England

COMPOSITION
100% Silk Single Georgette

DIMENSIONS
Approx 90cm x 90cm 

CARE
Dry clean only

*FREE RECORDED DELIVERY to all UK Mainland*
For everywhere else please select your shipping destination at the checkout.  Please allow 3-5 days for delivery, although it will usually take less time.

When you buy online, NANUKK scarves are sent to you beautifully packaged in our elegant signature box and are perfect for giving as a gift.

name: Darkling Grey Silk Scarf
description:
Darkling Beetles have been known to face their heads downwards whilst moving through their desert habitat.  A strange little fact that helped develop the idea for a very subtle, mysterious colour.

A sultry grey silk scarf, with a slight lustre to the soft fabric.  A beautifully crinkled texture enhances the volume and luxe feel.  Perfect for those that love to add an edgy statement accessory to any outfit.  

143cm x 91cm

Care Info:

100% Silk.  Cool Handwash Only.

name: Pink Sea Foam Silk Scarf
description:
The foam of the tide washing in but on pink.

A silk scarf capturing the essence of the rush of the tide.  A perfect piece for those that desire a burst of excitement in their wardrobe.  Peach and lilac patterns darting around between a pink border, this scarf is perfect for adding colour to a neutral outfit and is fantastic when worn with pearls.


Made In England

COMPOSITION
100% Silk Single Georgette

DIMENSIONS
Approx 90cm x 90cm 

CARE
Dry clean only

*FREE RECORDED DELIVERY to all UK Mainland*

name: Emerald Green Silk Scarf
description:
Inspired by the jewel-like casings known as "Elytra" that are found on beetles, this emerald silk scarf, has a subtle iridescent shimmer.  A green scarf that goes beautifully with denim or neutral tones. 

Made in England

141 x 91cm
